function.name: ocifreecollection
function.description: Deletes collection object.

function.name: ociloadlob
function.description: Loads a large object.

function.name: ocicommit
function.description: Commit the current context.

function.name: oci_commit
function.description: Commit the current context.

function.name: ocicolumnscale
function.description: Tell the scale of a column.

function.name: ocicollassign
function.description: Assign a collection from another existing collection.

function.name: ocirollback
function.description: Rollback the current context.

function.name: ocicolltrim
function.description: Trim num elements from the end of a collection.

function.name: ociparse
function.description: Parse a query and return a statement.

function.name: ocirowcount
function.description: Return the row count of an OCI statement.

function.name: ocicollassignelem
function.description: Assign element val to collection at index ndx.

function.name: ocisetprefetch
function.description: Sets the number of rows to be prefetched on execute to prefetch_rows for stmt.

function.name: ocifetch
function.description: Prepare a new row of data for reading.

function.name: ocilogoff
function.description: Disconnect from database.

function.name: oci_close
function.description: Closes Oracle connection.

function.name: ocifetchinto
function.description: Fetch a row of result data into an array.

function.name: ocicolumnisnull
function.description: Tell whether a column is NULL.

function.name: ocifreecursor
function.description: Free all resources associated with a statement.

function.name: ocinlogon
function.description: Connect to an Oracle database and log on. returns a new session.

function.name: ocisavelobfile
function.description: Saves a large object file.

function.name: ocicollgetelem
function.description: Retrieve the value at collection index ndx.

function.name: ocicolumnname
function.description: Tell the name of a column.

function.name: ociwritelobtofile
function.description: Writes a large object into a file.

function.name: ocisavelob
function.description: Saves a large object.

function.name: ocicancel
function.description: Cancels reading from cursor.

function.name: oci_cancel
function.description: Cancels reading from cursor.

function.name: ocierror
function.description: Return the last error of stmt|conn|global. If no error happened returns false.

function.name: oci_error
function.description: Return the last error of stmt|conn|global. If no error happened returns false.

function.name: ocicollsize
function.description: Return the size of a collection.

function.name: ocicollappend
function.description: Append an object to the collection.

function.name: ocifreedesc
function.description: Deletes large object description.

function.name: ocilogon
function.description: Establishes a connection to the Oracle server.

function.name: oci_connect
function.description: Establishes a connection to the Oracle server.

function.name: ocicolumntyperaw
function.description: Tell the raw oracle data type of a column.

function.name: ocinewcursor
function.description: Return a new cursor (Statement-Handle) - use this to bind ref-cursors!

function.name: ociinternaldebug
function.description: Toggle internal debugging output for the OCI extension.

function.name: ocistatementtype
function.description: Return the query type of an OCI statement.

function.name: ocinewcollection
function.description: Initialize a new collection.

function.name: ociplogon
function.description: Connect to an Oracle database using a persistent connection and log on. Returns a new session.

function.name: ociserverversion
function.description: Return a string containing server version information.

function.name: ocifreestatement
function.description: Free all resources associated with a statement.

function.name: ocicolumntype
function.description: Tell the data type of a column.

function.name: ocidefinebyname
function.description: Define a PHP variable to an Oracle column by name.

function.name: oci_define_by_name
function.description: Define a PHP variable to an Oracle column by name.

function.name: ocifetchstatement
function.description: Fetch all rows of result data into an array.

function.name: ociresult
function.description: Return a single column of result data.

function.name: ocibindbyname
function.description: Bind a PHP variable to an Oracle placeholder by name.

function.name: oci_bind_by_name
function.description: Bind a PHP variable to an Oracle placeholder by name.

function.name: ocinewdescriptor
function.description: Initialize a new empty descriptor LOB/FILE (LOB is default).

function.name: ocinumcols
function.description: Return the number of result columns in a statement.

function.name: ociexecute
function.description: Execute a parsed statement.

function.name: oci_execute
function.description: Execute a parsed statement.

function.name: ocicolumnsize
function.description: Tell the maximum data size of a column.

function.name: ocicolumnprecision
function.description: Tell the precision of a column.

function.name: oci_fetch
function.description: Fetches the next row into result-buffer.

function.name: oci_fetch_all
function.description: Fetches all rows of result data into an array.

function.name: oci_fetch_array
function.description: Returns the next row from the result data as an associative or numeric array, or both.

function.name: oci_fetch_assoc
function.description: Returns the next row from the result data as an associative array.

function.name: oci_fetch_object
function.description: Returns the next row from the result data as an object.

function.name: oci_fetch_row
function.description: Returns the next row from the result data as a numeric array.

function.name: oci_field_is_null
function.description: Checks if the field is NULL.

function.name: oci_field_name
function.description: Returns the name of a field from the statement.

function.name: oci_field_precision
function.description: Tell the precision of a field.

function.name: oci_field_scale
function.description: Tell the scale of the field.

function.name: oci_field_size
function.description: Returns field's size.

function.name: oci_field_type
function.description: Returns field's data type.

function.name: oci_field_type_raw
function.description: Tell the raw Oracle data type of the field.

function.name: oci_free_statement
function.description: Frees all resources associated with statement or cursor.

function.name: oci_internal_debug
function.description: Enables or disables internal debug output.

function.name: oci_lob_copy
function.description: Copies large object.

function.name: oci_lob_is_equal
function.description: Compares two LOB/FILE locators for equality.

function.name: oci_new_collection
function.description: Allocates new collection object.

function.name: oci_new_connect
function.description: Establishes a new connection to the Oracle server.

function.name: oci_new_cursor
function.description: Allocates and returns a new cursor (statement handle).

function.name: oci_new_descriptor
function.description: Initializes a new empty LOB or FILE descriptor.

function.name: oci_num_fields
function.description: Returns the number of result columns in a statement.

function.name: oci_num_rows
function.description: Returns number of rows affected during statement execution.

function.name: oci_parse
function.description: Prepares Oracle statement for execution.

function.name: oci_password_change
function.description: Changes password of Oracle's user.

function.name: oci_pconnect
function.description: Connect to an Oracle database using a persistent connection.

function.name: oci_result
function.description: Returns field's value from the fetched row.

function.name: oci_rollback
function.description: Rolls back outstanding transaction.

function.name: oci_server_version
function.description: Returns server version.

function.name: oci_set_prefetch
function.description: Sets number of rows to be prefetched.

function.name: oci_statement_type
function.description: Returns the type of an OCI statement.

function.name: append
function.description: Appends an object to the collection.

function.name: assign
function.description: Assigns a value to the collection from another existing collection.

function.name: assignElem
function.description: Assigns a value to the element of the collection.

function.name: getElem
function.description: Returns value of the element.

function.name: max
function.description: Gets the maximum number of elements in the collection.

function.name: size
function.description: Returns size of the collection.

function.name: trim
function.description: Trims elements from the end of the collection.

function.name: free
function.description: Frees resources associated with collection object.

function.name: free
function.description: Frees resources associated with descriptor.

function.name: append
function.description: Appends data from the large object to another large object.

function.name: close
function.description: Closes LOB descriptor.

function.name: eof
function.description: Tests for end-of-file on a large object's descriptor.

function.name: erase
function.description: Erases a specified portion of the internal LOB data.

function.name: export
function.description: Exports LOB's contents to a file.

function.name: flush
function.description: Flushes/writes buffer of the LOB to the server.

function.name: import
function.description: Imports file data to the LOB.

function.name: load
function.description: Returns large object's contents.

function.name: read
function.description: Reads part of large object.

function.name: rewind
function.description: Moves the internal pointer to the beginning of the large object.

function.name: save
function.description: Saves data to the large object.

function.name: seek
function.description: Sets the internal pointer of the large object.

function.name: size
function.description: Returns size of large object.

function.name: tell
function.description: Returns current position of internal pointer of large object.

function.name: truncate
function.description: Truncates large object.

function.name: writeTemporary
function.description: Writes temporary large object.

function.name: write
function.description: Writes data to the large object.

function.name: getBuffering
function.description: Returns current state of buffering for large object.

function.name: setBuffering
function.description: Changes current state of buffering for large object.
